name: Bell's Camp
description:
This game was created for Paint Jam 2021 with the theme of Campbell's Soup. Entering Bell's Camp! A game where you control a can of condensed soup and have to get to the goal plate for processing. Make sure you are right side up where you get there for the best score. Also try not to drop yourself into the abyss. That does not make for good soup!

Controls:
WASD to move, Z to undo

Includes:

  • 7 levels (with 3 tutorial levels)
  • Level Editor for more levels! I'm interested in what people can come up with using these mechanics.

Credits:

Made by: Kayden Fox
Music by: Andrey Sitkov
